verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H6942>Sanctify<s%> unto me all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>, whatsoever <S%H6363>openeth<s%> the <S%H7358>womb<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, both of <S%H120>man<s%> and of <S%H929>beast<s%>: it is mine.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, in which ye came <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage<s%>; for by <S%H2392>strength<s%> of <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> from this place: there shall no leavened <S%H2557>bread<s%> be <S%H398>eaten<s%>. bondage: Heb. servants
This <S%H3117>day<s%> came ye <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib<s%>.

And it shall be when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> thee into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, and the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, and the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>, which he <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> thee, a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>, that thou shalt <S%H5647>keep<s%> this <S%H5656>service<s%> in this <S%H2320>month<s%>.
<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>, and in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; and there shall no leavened <S%H2557>bread<s%> be <S%H7200>seen<s%> with thee, neither shall there be <S%H7603>leaven<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> with thee in all thy <S%H1366>quarters<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5046>shew<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This is done because <S%H5668>of<s%> <S%H2088>that<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto me when I came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And it shall be for a <S%H226>sign<s%> unto thee upon thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> between thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, that the <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> may be in thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: for with a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> brought thee <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
Thou shalt therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> this <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> in his <S%H4150>season<s%> from <S%H3117>year<s%> to <S%H3117>year<s%>.

And it shall be when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> thee into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, as he <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto thee and to thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and shall <S%H5414>give<s%> it thee,

That thou shalt set <S%H5674>apart<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> all that <S%H6363>openeth<s%> the <S%H7358>matrix<s%>, and every <S%H6363>firstling<s%> that <S%H7698>cometh<s%> of a <S%H929>beast<s%> which thou hast; the <S%H2145>males<s%> shall be the <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%>. set: Heb. cause to pass over

And every <S%H6363>firstling<s%> of an <S%H2543>ass<s%> thou shalt <S%H6299>redeem<s%> with a <S%H7716>lamb<s%>; and if thou wilt not <S%H6299>redeem<s%> it, then thou shalt break his <S%H6202>neck<s%>: and all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> among thy <S%H1121>children<s%> shalt thou <S%H6299>redeem<s%>. lamb: or, kid

And it shall be when thy <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7592>asketh<s%> thee in time to <S%H4279>come<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What is this? that thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto him, By <S%H2392>strength<s%> of <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> brought us <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage<s%>: in: Heb. to morrow

And it came to pass, when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> would <S%H7185>hardly<s%> let us <S%H7971>go<s%>, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2026>slew<s%> all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, both the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, and the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H929>beast<s%>: therefore I <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> all that <S%H6363>openeth<s%> the <S%H7358>matrix<s%>, being <S%H2145>males<s%>; but all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of my <S%H1121>children<s%> I <S%H6299>redeem<s%>.

And it shall be for a <S%H226>token<s%> upon thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and for <S%H2903>frontlets<s%> between thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: for by <S%H2392>strength<s%> of <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> brought us <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And it came to pass, when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> had let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5148>led<s%> them not through the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, <S%H3588>although<s%> that was <S%H7138>near<s%>; for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Lest peradventure the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5162>repent<s%> when they <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%>, and they <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>:

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5437>led<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%>, through the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>: and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H2571>harnessed<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>. harnessed: or, by five in a rank

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> with him: for he had <S%H7650>straitly<s%> <S%H7650>sworn<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6485>surely<s%> <S%H6485>visit<s%> you; and ye shall carry <S%H5927>up<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H5927>away<s%> hence with you.
And they took their <S%H5265>journey<s%> from <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H864>Etham<s%>, in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them by <S%H3119>day<s%> in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of a <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, to <S%H5148>lead<s%> them the <S%H1870>way<s%>; and by <S%H3915>night<s%> in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>, to give them <S%H215>light<s%>; to <S%H3212>go<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%>:

He took not <S%H4185>away<s%> the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%>, nor the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>, from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
